casebody.data:
SUZANNE M. SEARLES v. BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE TOWN OF WEST HARTFORD ET AL. (14107)

Spear, Hennessy and Freedman, Js.

Argued December 6, 1995 decision released January 9, 1996 Suzanne M. Searles, pro se, the appellant (plaintiff). Marjorie Wilder, corporation counsel, for the appel-lee (defendant). PER CURIAM.

The decision of the compensation review board is affirmed.
